desc: Deal 100% M.DMG and inflict [Speed Impair] state to 3 enemies that reduce its moving speed.

desc: Deal 120% P.DMG and inflict [Burning] state to 3 enemies that deal 50% ATK of M.DMG for 3 seconds.

name: Snake Hair
desc: Deals 100% True DMG to 3 enemies and inflicts [Petrified] state, rendering them unable to move for 4 sec.

name: Curse of the Abyss
desc: Deals 120% M.DMG to 3 enemies and inflicts [Speed Impair] state, reducing their SPD by 50% for 3 sec.

name: Divination

name: Surging Waves
desc: Deals 120% M.DMG to 3 enemies and inflicts [Poisoned] state, reducing 4% of their current HP per sec for 3 sec.

name: Ice world
desc: Deals 80% M.DMG to 4 enemies and inflicts [Spellbreaker] state, reducing their M.RES by 60% for 3 sec.

name: Final Stab
desc: Deals 300% P.DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP; If that target's HP is less than 50%, ensure a critical hit.

name: Youth Apple
desc: Deals 120% P.DMG to 3 enemies and inflicts [Ignite] state, receiving M.DMG equals to 60% ATK per sec for 3 sec.

name: Relentless Justice
desc: Inflicts [ATK Increase] state to 3 teammates, increasing their ATK by 150% for 5 sec.

name: Phantom Arrows
desc: Inflicts [SPD Increase] state to 3 teammates, increasing their SPD by 150% for 5 sec.

name: Box of Calamity
desc: Deals 140% M.DMG to 3 enemies and inflicts [Speed Impair]] state, reducing their SPD by 60% for 4 sec.

name: Descending Darkness

name: Taichi
desc: Deals 80% M.DMG to 4 enemies and inflicts [Stunned] state that last 4 sec

name: Nether Shot
desc: Deals 60% P.DMG to 6 enemies and inflicts [Ignite] state, dealing M.DMG equals to 60% ATK per sec for 4 sec.

name: Purging Arrow
desc: Deals 120% P.DMG and inflicts [Sunder Armor] state to 3 enemies, reducing their P.RES by 60% for 4 sec.

name: Unbridled Fury
desc: Deals 60% True DMG to 6 enemies; If the target is under [Ignite] state, ensure a critical hit.

name: Hammer of Chaos
desc: Deals 60% P.DMG to 6 enemies and inflicts [Poisoned] state, reducing 5% of the target's current HP per sec for 4 sec.

name: Infinite Tsukuyomi
desc: Deals 300% P.DMG to the enemy with the highest HP and inflicts [Break] state, reducing the target's M.RES and P.RES by 60% for 5 sec.
